snippet.title: Reducing Pimple Redness And Eliminating Acne
snippet.description: * Reducing Pimple Redness And Eliminating Acne (clueweb12-0202wb-53-05652) http://www.healthy-skin-guide.com/reducing-pimple-redness.html Reducing Pimple Redness And Eliminating Acne PIMPLE REDNESS Reducing pimple redness is very important. It is the first step in treating and preventing acne. Many people believe squeezing pimples will make them go away faster. Unfortunately squeezing pimples can...the healing process to take longer, and it makes you more likely to get additional acne in the future. The key to eliminating acne to use an effective treatment. An effective treatment is good at reducing pimple redness, eliminating acne, and preventing future breakouts. The most common places to get acne are on face, neck... [cached version]

snippet.title: Best Anti Acne Products for Treating Acne Redness
snippet.description: * Best Anti Acne Products for Treating Acne Redness (clueweb12-1912wb-87-20433) http://www.fithealthyliving.com/2010/06/how-to-get-rid-of-acne-redness/ Best Anti Acne Products for Treating Acne Redness ...It is important to experiment to see what works for you. Phototherapy People suffering from acne and the inflammation that leads to acne redness have practiced do it yourself phototherapy for years whether it is sunbathing outdoors or using indoor tanning salons. Phototherapy produces a substance called porphyrin which reduces the presence of Langerhans cells in the skin responsible for producing the inflamed acne lesions which cause acne redness and red acne scars. Intense pulsed light, blue light therapy... [cached version]
